# Pointer Events

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                           | Support        |
| ------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `pointer-events-none`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `pointer-events-auto`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `pointer-events-box-none`      | ðŸ“± Native only |
| `pointer-events-box-only`      | ðŸ“± Native only |
